name: Stargazers (LunaTechsDev)
description:
Synopsis : 

Tucked away near a remote village, a massive stone tower juts into the sky above. Each year, during the festival of the stars, stories passed down from the village elders tell of the tower reaching up into the stars themselves. Rumors abound, but no villager has ever beheld the inside of the tower. 

Curious of the rumors, Yula, a young girl of the village, wishes to uncover the mystery of the tower once and for all. 

The night before the festival, guided by the voice of a familiar apparition and the aide of her friend Haley, Yula ventures forth, not knowing the adventure that awaits her ahead.

Characters : 

YULA : 

Simple-minded and full of curiosity, Yula is an energetic girl with striking silver hair and violet eyes.

HALEY:

Haley: Brainy and proud of it, Haley prides herself on being full of dinosaur trivia and Yula's best friend. In that order.

THE TEAM : 

Kino - Tools Programmer, Voice Actor 

Inc0der - Tools Programmer 

U.K.L - Gameplay Programmer 

Amysaurus - Pixel Artist, Voice Actor 

Nio - Concept Artist  / Writer

JDSherbert - Audio Engineer / Proofreader 

Credits

Made using RPGMaker MZ - product of Gotcha Gotcha Games, Published by Komodo Co., Ltd.

[GAME STILL UNDER HEAVY DEVELOPMENT CONTENT SUBJECT TO CHANGE]
